comments.body:
This is correct. Unless you've changed your login shell to be PowerShell, `SHELL` will still be set to `/bin/bash`. If you change it, it correctly shows `/usr/local/bin/powershell`.

``` sh
sudo adduser powershell
...
sudo chsh powershell -s `which powershell`
sudo su -l powershell
PS /home/powershell> $env:SHELL
/usr/local/bin/powershell
```

title: $env:SHELL needs to be updated - it shows /bin/bash
